alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 16 at 1:34PM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 65 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust expected, which could lead to severely reduced visibility.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
